plot: An arrogant karate master named Tadashi Sawamura enters the kickboxing ring to prove his superiority, only to be beaten into a coma by a practictioner of the new art. After recovering, his trainer Endo convinced Sawamura to study kickboxing in order to regain his honor.
opening_theme: "Kick no Oni" (キックの鬼) by Tadashi Sawamura, Shounen Shoujo Gasshoudan Mizuumi
